Nate Schmidt was born in St. Cloud, Minnesota.

How tall is Nate Schmidt?

Nate Schmidt is 6-0 (183 cm) tall.

How much does Nate Schmidt weigh?

Nate Schmidt weighs 197 lbs (89 kg).

How many goals does Nate Schmidt have?

Nate Schmidt had 5 goals last season and 52 goals over his career.

How many points does Nate Schmidt have?

Nate Schmidt had 19 points last season and 239 points over his career.

How many Stanley Cups has Nate Schmidt won?

Nate Schmidt has won 1 Stanley Cup as a player.
